1.0.0.en: First version with support for the 1.54" and 2.9" tags

1.1.0.en: We've added support for Remote and Local templates to customize the tags exactly the way you want it!

1.1.1.en: New texts for Flows & improved images

1.1.2.en: Added crash-handling and added Dutch translation

1.2.0.en: Added support for Newton M3 2.9" and Solum 4.2"
